title: The Thirsting Walls
story: The very stones of Bran Castle seem to awaken as night falls, their ancient hunger stirring and subtly draining the life from those who dare to fight within its grasp.
effect: While this card is active, any hero who performs a combat action must immediately lose 1 Health. If that combat action resulted in a successful hit against a vampire, they also lose 1 Sanity. Furthermore, heroes cannot restore Health or Sanity by resting in the Dining Room or any Tower Bedroom (First, Master, or Second).
